articles.title: New hypercar the Divergent Czinger, is first to be 3-D printed and can go 0-60 in under two seconds
articles.description: The Czinger is the template for a whole new kind of manufacturing. Just as a computer can send information to a printer anywhere in the world to make a hard copy of a document, Divergent can do the same with the parts to build a car.
